items.sentence: Until yesterday, I'd never sung a song in French.
I talked myself into thinking it was a good idea.
Would you like coffee or tea with your breakfast?
The men playing poker looked up from their cards.
Tom obviously wasn't happy that he'd been chosen.
Mary was a bridesmaid at Tom and Alice's wedding.
As much as Tom tried to forget Mary, he couldn't.
Tom's first job was as an usher at movie theater.
I can't believe Tom would do something like that.
I need to know what's going on so I can help you.
I'll buy it off you if you make it a bit cheaper.
I prefer taking my shirt off when I go for a run.
I'm pretty good at cracking other people's backs.
Even though Tom was in pain, he managed to smile.
Would it be OK if I brought some friends with me?
Would it be OK if I crashed on your sofa tonight?
We've already survived many difficult situations.
We tend to judge people by the company they keep.
Why don't you pick on somebody else for a change?
Why don't you put your money where your mouth is?
